titles.title: Booker T. Washington Boundary Expansion Act
To expand the boundary of Booker T. Washington National Monument, and for other purposes.
Booker T. Washington Boundary Expansion Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Booker T. Washington Boundary Expansion Act - Amends federal law relating to the establishment of the Booker T. Washington National Monument in Virginia to expand the boundary of the Monument to include specified lands.
